item.title: C++ Notes
item.description: Motivations I have to work on a project using cpp soon. Having little exposure to it, I’ll try to quickly learn the basics of the language. Starting with 1998 C++ (The C++ Programming Language, Stroustrup). This post will be a collection of brief notes/snippets. Some links Learning C++ if you already know C C++ built on C95. Compatibility of C and C++ void* pointers conversion to enum
